mapper.update: update qna_board set qna_password=#{qna_password}, qna_secret_chk=#{qna_secret_chk}, qna_title=#{qna_title}, qna_content=#{qna_content}, qna_regdate=#{qna_regdate} where qna_board_no=#{qna_board_no}

choose.when: where qna_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or qna_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select: select IFnull(count(*),0) from qna_board qq inner join member_Info mm on qq.mem_no=mm.mem_no

select qq.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from qna_board qq inner join member_Info mm on qq.mem_no=mm.mem_no
order by qq.qna_board_no desc limit #{startRow},10
mapper.update: update qna_board set qna_hit=qna_hit+1 where qna_board_no=#{qna_board_no}
